trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleContent" name="simpleContent" href=""></xref> element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_simpleContent" name="simpleContent" href=""> </xref> elemento do esquema XML, conforme especificado pelo World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

trans-unit.source: This class is for simple and complex types with simple content model.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é para tipos simples e complexos com o modelo de conteúdo simple.

trans-unit.source: XmlSchemaSimpleContent is used to indicate that the content model of the new type contains only character data and no elements.
trans-unit.target: XmlSchemaSimpleContent é usado para indicar que o modelo de conteúdo do novo tipo contém apenas dados de caractere e nenhum elemento.

Ele faz isso por meio de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContentExtension>ou <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContentExtension>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContent"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `simpleContent` element enables you to specify an element as containing a simple type with no elements and restrict the value of the element's content or extend the content with attributes.
trans-unit.target: O `simpleContent` elemento permite que você especifique um elemento que contém um tipo simples sem elementos e restringir o valor do conteúdo do elemento ou estender o conteúdo com atributos.

trans-unit.source: The content contained within the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction" name="XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSimpleContentExtension" name="XmlSchemaSimpleContentExtension" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dentro do <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction" name="XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaSimpleContentExtension" name="XmlSchemaSimpleContentExtension" href=""> </xref> classe.
